text: AfterMASH was an American TV series. It was a spin-off of the M*A*S*H TV series. It was not a successful series, and was canceled after two seasons. == References == == Other websites == *Finest-Kind.net - M*A*S*H website with info on AfterMASH * *TV.com AfterMASH page Category:1983 American television series debuts Category:1985 American television series endings Category:1980s American sitcoms Category:CBS network shows Category:American television spin- offs Category:English-language television programs
title: AfterMASH
